title: Definitions
context: [PART VII.] NEEDLE EXCHANGE PROGRAM Cross References Sale of sterile syringes for prevention of disease, see ยง325-21. [ยง325-111] Definitions. As used in this part, unless the context otherwise requires: &ldquo;Department&rdquo; means the department of health. &ldquo;Director&rdquo; means the director of health. &ldquo;Participant&rdquo; means an injection drug user who exchanges a sterile needle and syringe unit pursuant to the program. &ldquo;Program&rdquo; means the sterile needle and syringe exchange program. [L 1992, c 152, pt of ยง2]
